content:
Action:3

I'm moving right from (1,1) to begin my path along row 1 so that I can eventually get closer to the key at (3,10), following the safe route outlined in the strategy.

Action:3

I'm moving right, expecting the avatar to rotate (if needed) and then advance from (1,2) toward (1,3) on the way to reach the key at (3,10).

Action:3

I'm moving RIGHT from (1,3) toward (1,4) since that direction opens a path to eventually drop down to the key at (3,10), aligning with the strategy of securing the key first.

Action:3

I'm moving RIGHT to head toward the key along the open corridor, expecting that this action will either rotate the avatar right or, if already facing right, move it to (1,5) as planned.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (1,5) to (1,6) to begin heading toward the key at (3,10), following the strategy of securing the key first.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (1,6) to head toward the key at (3,10) and expect the avatar to advance to (1,7) after this action.

Action:4

I'm moving down from row1, col7 to row2, col7, which brings me closer to the key at row3, col10 in accordance with the strategy.

Action:4  
I'm moving down from (1,7) to (2,7) to begin the route toward the key at (3,10), expecting to progress closer to the objective.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (2,7) toward the key at (3,10) by heading to (2,8) next, aligning with the plan to secure the key before tackling enemies.

Action:3  
I'm moving right from (2,7) to (2,8) to start heading towards the key at (3,10), expecting that this will align with our plan of reaching the key via the clear path.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (2,8) to (2,9) to begin the path toward the key at (3,10), following the planned route.

Action:3

I’m moving the avatar to the RIGHT to approach the key (located at row3, col10) by first heading from (2,9) to (2,10); this aligns with the strategy to secure the key before proceeding to the door.

``` Action:4 ```
I'm moving down from (2,10) towards the key at (3,10), expecting to pick it up to progress toward reaching the door later.

Action:4

I'm moving down towards the key at (3,10) to secure it, which aligns with our strategy of first obtaining the key before heading to the door.

Action:2

I'm moving left from (3,10) since down and right are blocked, expecting that a lateral maneuver will help me discover an alternative route toward the door.

Action:2

I'm moving left from my current position at (3,10) to head toward an open corridor that will eventually lead me around the wall and toward the door, following our plan to approach the goal with the key in hand.

Action:5

I'm moving the avatar upward from (3,9) to (2,9) to start navigating toward the door by accessing the larger corridor; this aligns with the strategy of finding a safer path toward the goal while avoiding walls.

Action:5

I’m moving UP from (3,9) to (2,9) to begin the detour toward an accessible corridor that will eventually let me drop down toward the door at (5,10), aligning with our strategy.

Action:4

I'm moving the avatar down from (2,9) to (3,9) as part of a planned path toward the door at (5,10), expecting this move to progress our route.

Action:2

I’ll move left from (2,9) toward column 7 so that I can later drop down through the corridor that leads (via row6) to the door. I expect this to begin aligning our path toward the win condition.

Action:4

I'm moving down from (2,9) to approach the door via the lower corridors, expecting the avatar's position to update to continue our planned path toward row5, col10 where the door is located.

Action:2

I'm moving left from (2,9) to (2,8) to head toward a connecting corridor that will eventually allow me to descend to row6 and then navigate to the door.

``` Action:2 ```
I'm moving left from my current position (2,9) to (2,8) in an effort to find a corridor that eventually leads down toward the door, all while staying safe from enemies as I have already obtained the key.

Action:2

I'm moving left from the current position (row2, col8) to start heading towards the pathway that will eventually allow me to reach the door, following the plan to go down via the left corridor.

``` Action:4 ```
I am moving my avatar one step down from (2,7) to (3,7) to start following the safe path that leads toward the door from below.

Action:4

I'm moving down from (2,7) toward the lower rows so I can eventually reach row6 and then approach the door at (5,10), aligning with the strategy of using the key to win.

Action:4

I'm moving down from (3,7) to (4,7) as planned, beginning my route toward reaching the door at (5,10).

Action:4

I'm moving down from (4,7) to (5,7) to start progressing toward the door, as our planned path avoids walls and enemies.

Action:4

I'm moving down from (5,7) to (6,7) along the planned route, expecting to bypass the wall at (5,8) and approach the door via a lower row.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (6,7) towards (6,8) to progress along the row towards the door at (5,10), aligning with our strategy of reaching the goal with the key.

Action:3  
I'm moving right from (6,7) toward (6,8) to begin a path along the corridor toward the door, expecting that the avatar's position will update accordingly.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (6,8) aiming to bring the avatar closer to the door at (5,10) by positioning it such that an upward move will eventually put it on the door tile, following our strategic plan.

Action:5

I'm moving UP to progress from (6,9) to (5,9) as part of approaching the door at (5,10), aligning with the strategy to reach the goal with the key.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (6,9) to (6,10) to align myself closer to the door at (5,10), expecting that subsequent upward movement will bring me directly to the goal.

Action:5

I'm moving UP from (6,9) (withkey) toward the door, expecting to step into (5,9) so that I can then approach the door at (5,10) on the next move.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (6,9) to (6,10), which should place me one step closer to the goal at (5,10) once I move up next.

Action:5

I'm moving upward from (6,9) to (5,9) to get closer to the door at (5,10), in line with our strategy to reach the goal with the key.

Action:5

I'm moving UP to advance from (6,9) to (5,9), which positions my avatar closer to the door at (5,10) so I can reach and open it on the next move.

Action:3

I'm moving right to get from my current position (with the key) to the door, expecting the door to open and win the level upon contact.

Action:3

I'm moving right from my current position at (5,9) toward the door at (5,10) since I'm in the "withkey" state, and touching the door will complete the win condition.
